name: @wessberg/typescript-ast-util
description: A helper class for working with Typescript's AST

scripts.readme:refresh: npm run changelog:generate && npm run readme:badges
scripts.commit:readme: npm run readme:refresh && git commit -am "Bumped version" --no-verify || true
scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:compiled
scripts.build: npm run build:cjs & npm run build:es2015
scripts.build:prod: NODE_ENV=production npm run build:cjs && NODE_ENV=production npm run build:es2015
scripts.validate: npm run tslint && npm run test
scripts.pretest: npm run clean:compiled && npm run tsc:test
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run validate && npm run build:prod
scripts.publish:major: npm version major && npm run commit:readme && git push --no-verify && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && npm run commit:readme && git push --no-verify && npm publish
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && npm run commit:readme && git push --no-verify && npm publish
